text: Lady Davina Elizabeth Alice Benedikte Windsor (born 19 November 1977) is a member of the British royal family. In May 2023, she was 35th in the line of succession to the British throne. She was also known as Lady Davina Lewis between 2004 and 2018. She is the elder daughter of Prince Richard, Duke of Gloucester and Birgitte, Duchess of Gloucester. She is divorced from her former husband, Gary Lewis. ==Titles == *19 November 1977- 31 July 2004 Lady Davina Windsor *31 July 2004-2018 Lady Davina Lewis *2018-present Lady Davina Windsor == References == Category:1977 births Category:Living people Davina Windsor Category:People from Paddington Category:British royalty
title: Lady Davina Windsor
